main event: A civilian reported observing an unidentified flying object over Kettering, Ohio on August 5, 1966, for a duration of 3-5 minutes.
interesting points: The object was described as shiny and metallic, possibly the size of a car seen from about 2.3 miles away., There were two witnesses present during the sighting., The object was reported to have emitted a bluish-white glow., The sky condition was partly cloudy at the time of observation., No photos or physical evidence were documented alongside the sighting.
